projectsList.name: Mailbot Demonstration
projectsList.description: Navigation of a custom robot delivering mail using algorithmic path-planning, under a ROS2 simulation in a Gazebo environment across several worlds

projectsList.name: Brachiating Gibbon
projectsList.description: ROS manipulation task of gibbon URDF with multiple joints to swing along a branch in order to analyze its energy-efficient motion at constant branch height and branch-branch spacings

projectsList.name: Dynamic Obstacle Avoidance
projectsList.description: Simulation of moving robot vacuum across A*, RRT, DWA, and APF motion algorithms that minimize colliding with human-controlled agents, using the Habitat-Sim library.

projectsList.name: Assisted Fast Policy Generation
projectsList.description: Boosting a learning agent's performance across video games by combining human-demonstrated mimicry with DDQN to generate higher reward policies and accelerate convergence.

projectsList.name: Atlanta Crime Prediction
projectsList.description: Class group project using unsupervised and supervised methods to visualize and predict a crime's severity, factoring location and time of crime in Atlanta, GA.
